title: Scalable Spatiotemporal Inference with Biased Scan Attention Transformer Neural Processes
summary: This paper introduces the Biased Scan Attention Transformer Neural Process (BSA-TNP), a new architecture for scalable spatiotemporal inference. It is designed to model stochastic processes that evolve in both space and time, offering improved accuracy and training speed. The BSA-TNP supports high-dimensional fixed effects and scales gracefully for large datasets.
